Package com.centimia.orm.jaqu.util

Utility classes used for the JaQu (Java Query) tool.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClassUtils This utility class contains functions related to class loading.
IOUtils This utility class contains input/output functions.
JdbcUtils This is a utility class with JDBC helper functions.
StatementBuilder A utility class to build a statement.
StatementLogger Utility class to optionally log generated statements to an output stream.
StringUtils  
Utils Generic utility methods.
WeakIdentityHashMap<K,V> This hash map uses weak references, so that elements that are no longer referenced elsewhere can be garbage collected.
 

Package com.centimia.orm.jaqu.util Description

Utility classes used for the JaQu (Java Query) tool.
